desc: Vamoosh Pet Hair Dissolver is the world's first pet hair remover for use in the washing machine. For dog beds, cat beds and pet bedding. Vamoosh dissolves pet hair in the wash. Also NEW Vamoosh Lingerie Whitener as loved by Lynsey Queen of Clean - transforms your grey bras and underwear up to 10 shades whiter!

layout.text: Discover our innovative award winning products
